summary: Johan and Anna-Karin have been a couple for years but despite many attempts, Anna-Karin doesn't get pregnant. A visit to a fertility clinic shows why: Johan's sperm quality is too low. ... See full summary »
cast: Jonas Karlsson|Johanna Sällström|Ralph Carlsson|Shanti Roney|Michalis Koutsogiannakis|Lisa Lindgren|Michael Nyqvist|Ingela Olsson|Anders Janzon|Gunilla Abrahamsson|Angela Kovacs
title: Hans och hennes
